channel.title: CVE Feed for Uncanny Owl -- Uncanny Toolkit Pro for LearnDash
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Uncanny Owl -- Uncanny Toolkit Pro for LearnDash

item.title: CVE-2024-37436|2024-07-23T13:34:16.818Z -- uncanny%20owl -- uncanny%20toolkit%20pro%20for%20learndash
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Uncanny Owl Uncanny Toolkit Pro for LearnDash allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Uncanny Toolkit Pro for LearnDash: from n/a before 4.1.4.1.
